windlord::

windlord ssstopped and looked around, the landscape looked disturbed 
and someone had been there... He looked awared and waited, expecting 
a signal that could be usefuol to detect whoever was there

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> The bounty hunter detected a signal approaching his position.  He 
moved his Transmetal 2 girth to the shadows, and hid.  He waited as 
the mystery bot approached.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:windlord::
> 
> windlord picked up a signal that a bot or bots was close to Maximal 
> base, then he decided to find out what's goin and walked towards 
the 
> location of the signals
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "bustercross365" 
<bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > The bounty hunter quickly broke of pursuit, he wasn't able to 
keep 
> > up.  He instead turned to the closest base, which, as far as he 
> could 
> > tell, was a Maximal base.  He moved to his new route he,and 
trucked 
> > along, for hours on end.  A few hours later he was a kilometer, 
and 
> > decide to stop and let the occupants of the base come to him, he 
> > didn't want start on their bad side.  So instead, he entertained 
> > himself, in his beast mode, with the trivial plants and animals 
on 
> > prehistoric Earth.  
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > A craft, appearently Minicon, flew over the bounty hunter.  He 
> > transformed into his transmetal 2 t-rex beast form and pursued it 
> to 
> > its destination. 
> > > 
> > >
